question: Which among the following is/are female hormones? (i)Estrogen (ii)Progesterone (iii)Testosterone
explanation: The ovaries maintain the health of the female reproductive system. They secrete two main hormonesâ€”estrogen and progesterone. Diseases associated with the ovaries include ovarian cysts, ovarian cancer, menstrual cycle disorders, and polycystic ovarian syndrome.
